tenders.title: Supply of Office Furniture
tenders.description: The Federal Ministry of Works invites eligible vendors to submit bids for the supply and delivery of high-quality office furniture to its headquarters in Abuja. Bidders must demonstrate capacity, relevant experience, and financial capability.

tenders.title: Road Rehabilitation Project – Enugu State
tenders.description: The Enugu State Government seeks qualified contractors for the rehabilitation and resurfacing of selected rural roads. Bidders must be registered construction firms with verifiable experience in civil works.

tenders.title: ICT Equipment Supply and Installation
tenders.description: The Lagos State ICT Agency invites reputable firms to bid for the supply, installation, and maintenance of ICT infrastructure including servers, networking equipment, and security systems.

tenders.title: Provision of Cleaning and Sanitation Services
tenders.description: The Rivers State University invites tenders from qualified cleaning service providers for the provision of cleaning and sanitation services across its campuses for a period of two years.

tenders.title: Supply of Laboratory Chemicals and Equipment
tenders.description: The Kano State Polytechnic invites sealed bids from reputable vendors for the supply of laboratory chemicals, reagents, and modern science equipment for its engineering and science departments.

tenders.title: Construction of Solar-Powered Boreholes
tenders.description: The Kaduna Rural Water Supply and Sanitation Agency (RUWASSA) invites tenders from qualified contractors for the construction of 20 solar-powered boreholes across rural communities in Kaduna State.

tenders.title: Healthcare Equipment and Medical Supplies
tenders.description: The Ogun State Ministry of Health invites bids for the supply of essential medical equipment and consumables for state-owned healthcare facilities. Bidders must be registered pharmaceutical or medical equipment suppliers.

tenders.title: School Bus Transportation Services
tenders.description: The Abuja Municipal Area Council (AMAC) seeks qualified transport companies to provide school bus services for public primary schools. Bidders must have a fleet of roadworthy buses and valid operating licenses.

tenders.title: Design and Construction of Multi-Purpose Hall
tenders.description: The Imo State Government invites architectural and construction firms to bid for the design and construction of a 5,000-capacity multi-purpose hall in Owerri. Firms must demonstrate prior experience in similar projects.

tenders.title: Supply of Agricultural Inputs to Farmers
tenders.description: The Niger State Agricultural Development Agency invites suppliers to bid for the provision of fertilizers, improved seedlings, and farming implements for distribution to registered smallholder farmers.

tenders.title: Waste Management and Recycling Services
tenders.description: The Anambra State Environmental Protection Agency (ANSEPA) invites reputable waste management companies to bid for the collection, transportation, and recycling of municipal solid waste in Awka and Onitsha.

tenders.title: Security and Surveillance System Installation
tenders.description: The Cross River State Government seeks qualified firms for the supply and installation of CCTV cameras and integrated security systems across major state facilities and public spaces in Calabar.

tenders.title: Printing of Examination Materials
tenders.description: The Joint Admissions and Matriculation Board (JAMB) invites bids from licensed printing companies for the printing and packaging of examination booklets and answer sheets for the upcoming UTME exercises.

tenders.title: Renovation of Government Secondary Schools
tenders.description: The Plateau State Universal Basic Education Board (SUBEB) invites qualified contractors to bid for the renovation and rehabilitation of 15 government secondary schools across the state.

tenders.title: Supply of Diesel and Lubricants
tenders.description: The Nigerian Railway Corporation invites petroleum product marketers to bid for the supply of AGO (diesel) and industrial lubricants for its locomotive fleet and maintenance facilities nationwide.

tenders.title: Consultancy for Urban Development Master Plan
tenders.description: The Nasarawa State Urban Development Board seeks consultancy services from experienced urban planning firms for the development of a comprehensive 20-year master plan for Lafia metropolis.

tenders.title: Catering Services for Training Workshops
tenders.description: The National Institute for Hospitality and Tourism (NIHOTOUR) invites catering service providers to bid for the provision of meals and refreshments for participants during capacity building workshops.

tenders.title: Construction of Drainage Systems
tenders.description: The Bayelsa State Ministry of Environment invites civil engineering firms to bid for the construction of drainage and flood control systems in flood-prone areas of Yenagoa and environs.

tenders.title: Supply of Fire Fighting Equipment
tenders.description: The Federal Fire Service invites manufacturers and suppliers of fire fighting equipment to bid for the supply of fire trucks, hoses, protective gear, and other emergency response equipment.

tenders.title: Audit and Tax Consultancy Services
tenders.description: The Ekiti State Ministry of Finance invites registered chartered accounting firms to bid for the provision of audit, tax consultancy, and financial advisory services for the 2025 fiscal year.
